title: havent gotten my gold rewards?
body: so everyone on my friends list has there rewards for hitting a certain tier for ranked like the icons and boarders and I don't have anything for gold. is there a reason for this that I just happen to miss some information somewhere and just haven't gotten it yet unfortunately?

replies.body: No worries just yet, you haven't been missed! Those rewards will be going out over the course of Nov so you should have yours in a week or so. If not, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) towards the end of the month!
